name: 30_dockerignore_filter_commit
description: Demonstrate some how to check if a commit should trigger docker build

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.docker:build: docker build --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t 30_commit_trigger_checker .
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker build --no-cache --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t 30_commit_trigger_checker .
